artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Openweave warp stripes in various threads and textures. Openweave with vertical stripes in yellow, green and white warp. Tan weft. Left selvedge. Machine stitched on two sides. (beige, white, pale green, yellow, tan)
